body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "libc_replacer", version = "0.1.2")
```


## What's Changed
* add new CI runners by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/42
* fix: always resolve symlinks when building a tarball by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/43
* use cache by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/44
* Revert "use cache (#44)" by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/45
* Use cache for non-scheduled jobs by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/46
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.0.0 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/47
* Updated toolchains_llvm to 1.3.0 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/48
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.0.1 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/49
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.0.3, load C/C++ APIs from `rules_cc`, shell APIs from `rules_shell` by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/50

## New Contributors
* @bazel-steward-app made their first contribution in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/47

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/compare/0.1.1...0.1.2

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "libc_replacer", version = "0.1.1")
```


## What's Changed
* Update README.md: fix typo by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/38
* Update run_unit_test.bash by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/39
* Update clang_tidy_integration_test.bash by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/40
* change license to cc0 by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/41


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/compare/0.1.0...0.1.1

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 or greater

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "libc_replacer", version = "0.1.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Basic setup by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/1
* Update dependabot.yml: change to daily by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/2
* Update tests.yml: add scheduled workflow by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/3
* fix: avoid bash injection in github actions by using `env` by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/4
* use latest ubuntu where version is not important by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/5
* chore: Use wildcard for bazel version by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/7
* Implement API for replacing `time` by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/6
* Execute linters/formatters in parallel by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/8
* define preprocessor macros to facilitate declaration/definition by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/9
* introduce clang-format by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/10
* Modify clang-format config by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/11
* remove unused typedef by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/12
* rename as cc.bzl by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/13
* fix: use `toolchains_musl` for ensuring static linking by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/14
* quickly update readme by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/16
* Erase `LIBC_REPLACER_INTERNAL_ANNOTATE` by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/17
* fix: assertion in test by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/18
* Implement more time-related APIs by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/19
* Implement `malloc` and `free` by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/20
* rename directories by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/21
* drop suppressed clang-tidy configuration by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/22
* implement malloc APIs revisited by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/23
* drop `LIBC_REPLACER_INTERNAL_DEFINE_RETURNING_VOID` by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/24
* Update bazel-steward.yml: Only specify the major version by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/25
* Update macro_impl.h: Update doc by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/26
* Unit test by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/27
* check global variables in integration tests by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/28
* Refactor testing utilities by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/29
* Test with different compilation modes by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/30
* use debuggable pointer name by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/31
* restrict environment variables when running tests by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/32
* Divide headers into sub-libraries by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/34
* Update readme by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/35
* Update README.md by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/36
* BCR configuration by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/37

## New Contributors
* @yuyawk made their first contribution in https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/libc_replacer/commits/0.1.0
